content: frost & rime this hat and mitt set will keep you warm and cozy all winter long the stitch pattern is simple but interesting and the super bulky yarn knits up so fast they are perfect for last minute gifts www magpiefibers com all images and text ©magpie fibers 2017 materials magpie plush super bulky approx 65 yds 85 yds stitch marker needles us size 13 9mm 16 circular and dpns or needles for preferred method gauge 11 stitches x 14 row = 4 in 1x1 rib sizes toque slouch/folded brim finished dimensions 9 x 18-22 12 x 18-22 hat pattern cast on 48 48 stitches and join for working in the round being careful not to twist your stitches place marker for beginning of round ribbing k1 p1 for 2 4 main pattern 1 k3 p3 abbreviations 2 k1 p1 continue in pattern for 4 6 k - knit p - purl decreases k2tog - knit two stitches together 1 *k3 p1 p2tog* p2tog - purl two stitches together 2 *k1 pi k1 p2* 3 *k3 p2tog* 4 *k1 p1* 5 *k2 k2tog* 6 remove marker k1 replace marker *p1 k2* 7 *p1 k2tog* 8 *k2tog* 9 *k2tog* cut yarn leaving enough to weave in wet block make and attach pom pom if desired *wet blocking will allow fabric to relax and hat to achieve the correct size www magpiefibers com all images and text ©magpie fibers 2017 materials magpie plush super bulky approx 55 yds 50 yds stitch marker needles s/m - us size 13 9mm dpns m/l - us size 15 10mm dpns or circular needles for preferred method gauge 11 sts x 14 row = 4 in 1x1 rib size s/m m/l abbreviations finished size after blocking k - knit s/m - approx 7 1/2 length and 7-9 in p - purl circumference m/l - approx 7 length and 8-11 in circumference mitts pattern cast on 18 18 stitches and join for working in the round being careful not to twist stitches place marker for beginning of round 1 *k1 k1 p1 x 3 k2* x 2 2 *k2 p1 k3 p1 k2* x 2 repeat row 1 & 2 for 14 10 row thumb opening turn and work as if working flat for 6 6 row 3 *p2 k1 p1 x2 k1 p2* x 2 4 *k2 p1 k3 p1 k2* x 2 join in the round repeat row 1 and 2 two times repeat row 1 once bind off leaving enough tail to weave in wet block *wet blocking will allow fabric to relax and mitts to achieve the correct size www magpiefibers com all images and text ©magpie fibers 2017 thanks for knitting with me come visit us at www magpiefibers com or magpie fibers on ravelry and instagram samples shown in page 1 and 4 queen frostine page 3 woodsmoke www magpiefibers com all images and text ©magpie fibers 2017
